name: Tree Synergy
description: When you build a tree building, there is a chance you get another building

name: Ocean Synergy
description: Increase the chance a flying creature and castle in the sky spawn

name: Sail Synergy
description: decrease the chance a building get destroyed

name: Food Synergy
description: Increase happiness generation for each food building

name: Light Synergy
description: When you build a Lighting building, the fog around the building will be eliminated more

name: Navi Synergy
description: gives you more buff when hit the milestone

name: Construction Synergy
description: When you build any tower, all construction building get extra happiness

name: Entertaining Synergy
description: For all building, when generate happiness, it might generate double/triple
